column6:
Marvel proudly introduces...Wonder Man! The newest, most dynamic surprise character from the world-famous House of Ideas! Destined to become one of the most provocative, exciting, talked-about new characters of the year! Wait till you see him in this legendary yarn by Stan Lee and Don Heck from AVENGERS #9! Plus, an ALL-NEW Wonder Man adventure, with art by up-and-coming sensation Juan Doe!,2008,2
Rated A...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Art Adams | artist:Juan Doe | artist:Don Heck | writer:Stan Lee | writer:Dwayne McDuffie | colorist:Mike Avon Oeming | letterer:Rus Wooton
